Name: PukupukuWaterSurface
Notes: A fish enemy that swims on the surface of the water area it's inside. When it touches ice collision, it will be frozen to ice. It can be defeated through all of the player's attacks, which causes it to drop a Coin or three Star Bits when defeated. It can be frozen by the Orange Luma.

Obj_arg0.Name: Invalidate Shadow?
Obj_arg0.Description: If set, its shadow will be invalidated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted and eaten by Yoshi.
